What does the continue statement do inside a loop in Java?

A) Ends the loop entirely.
B) Skips the current iteration and proceeds directly to the next.
C) Restarts the loop from the beginning.
D) Pauses the loop until a new condition is met.

What is the main advantage of using parameters in a method?

A) It allows a method to work with different values, making the code more flexible and reusable.
B) It makes the code longer and more complicated.
C) It prevents the method from being called multiple times.
D) It makes the program faster and more efficient to execute.
